seg.quote: ...the growing public concern over Britain's poor economic performance.
My concern is that many of these cases are going unnoticed.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
concerns someone
, tistemu človeku povzroča skrbi.

seg.quote: One of the things that concerns me is the rise in vandalism.
He was concerned about the level of unemployment.

gramGrp.pos:
REFL VB
or
VB
with
OBJ

sense.def:
To concern oneself with something
pomeni nečemu posvečati pozornost zaradi prepričanja, da je pomembno.

cit.quote: delati si skrbi; zanimati se za kaj

seg.quote: I don't want you to concern yourself with it.
We are more concerned with efficiency than expansion.

sense.def:
One's concern for someone
je želja, da bi bil določen človek srečen, zdrav in na varnem.

seg.quote: She shows a true concern for others.

sense.def:
Kadr položaj, dogodek ali dejavnost
concerns someone
, vpliva na nekega človeka ali pa je človek vanj vpleten.

seg.quote: These are matters which some of my colleagues would think do not concern them.
It was a perfect arrangement for all concerned.

sense.def:
Kadar je neki položaj ali problem
someone's concern
, sodi med njegove dolžnosti ali pa je zanj odgovoren.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
or
PASSIVE VB
with
‘with’

sense.def:
Kadar neka knjiga, govor ali podatek
concerns a particular subject
ali
is concerned with a particular subject
, govori o tisti témi.

seg.quote: This chapter is concerned with changes that are likely to take place.

sense.def:
A concern
je tudi podjetje ali družba.

seg.quote: ...the giant West German chemical concern, Hoechst.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
as far as something is concerned
, nakažemo, o kateri témi govorimo.

seg.quote: We have rather a poor record as far as regional studies are concerned.

sense.def:
As far as I'm concerned
rečemo, kadar hočemo povedati svoje mnenje.

cit.quote: kar zadeva mene, kar se mene tiče

seg.quote: This is all rubbish as far as I'm concerned.
